headline.main: TURKISH PRESIDENT FINDS WAR NEARER; Warns Parliament Attack May Come -- Declares Aim to Maintain Alliances

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Nov. 1 -- Turkey is in graver danger than ever before of aggression from the belligerents in World War II and the Turkish Republic faces a long and difficult Winter and Spring fraught with fresh perils menacing the nation's steadfast, armed neutrality, President Ismet Inonu warned this afternoon in opening the fourth session of the sixteenth National Assembly in a traditional address in the Turkish capital.
abstract: Pres Inonu warns of threat to Turkish neutrality

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
